original_text: This is how Jesus Christ was born. His mother's name was Mary. She had promised to marry a man called Joseph. Then she discovered that she was pregnant. This happened before they started to live together. It was the Holy Spirit that caused this to happen to her.
korean_text: 예수 그리스도의 나심은 이러하니라 그의 어머니 마리아가 요셉과 약혼하고 동거하기 전에 성령으로 잉태된 것이 나타났더니

sentences.original_text: This is how Jesus Christ was born
She had promised to marry a man called Joseph
Then she discovered that she was pregnant
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그녀가 임신한 것을 알게 되었습니다

sentences.original_text: This happened before they started to live together
sentences.korean_translation: 이 일은 그들이 함께 살기 전에 일어났습니다

sentences.original_text: It was the Holy Spirit that caused this to happen to her
sentences.korean_translation: 성령께서 그녀에게 이 일이 일어나게 하셨습니다
